article_title: A Hidden Obamacare "Tax" That Few Know About But Close To 40% May End Up Paying

article_metadata.description: Yesterday the Internal Revenue Service posted guidance outlining its intent to enforce Obamacare’s “individual mandate” – a tax on those who don’t sign up by the end of March for health insurance that meets the law’s requirements. It was part of the plan all along, that health officials would raise [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
